info.title: Azure Network Fabric Management Service API
info.description: Self service experience for Azure Network Fabric API.

TerminalServerPatchableProperties.description: Network and credential configuration currently applied on terminal server.

username.description: Username for the terminal server connection.

password.description: Password for the terminal server connection.

VpnConfigurationProperties.description: Network and credential configuration currently applied on terminal server.

networkToNetworkInterconnectId.description: ARM Resource ID of the Network To Network Interconnect.

VpnConfigurationPatchableProperties.description: Network and credential configuration currently applied on terminal server.

networkToNetworkInterconnectId.description: ARM Resource ID of the Network To Network Interconnect.

rackCount.description: Number of compute racks associated to Network Fabric.

serverCountPerRack.description: Number of servers.Possible values are from 1-16.

fabricASN.description: ASN of CE devices for CE/PE connectivity.

terminalServerConfiguration.description: Network and credentials configuration already applied to terminal server.

managementNetworkConfiguration.description: Configuration to be used to setup the management network.

networkFabricSku.description: Supported Network Fabric SKU.Example: Compute / Aggregate racks. Once the user chooses a particular SKU, only supported racks can be added to the Network Fabric. The SKU determines whether it is a single / multi rack Network Fabric.

items.description: Router Id of CE to be used for MP-BGP between PE and CE

networkFabricControllerId.description: Azure resource ID for the NetworkFabricController the NetworkFabric belongs.

rackCount.description: Number of compute racks associated to Network Fabric.

serverCountPerRack.description: Number of servers.Possible values are from 1-16.

fabricASN.description: ASN of CE devices for CE/PE connectivity.

terminalServerConfiguration.description: Network and credentials configuration currently applied to terminal server.

managementNetworkConfiguration.description: Configuration to be used to setup the management network.

racks.description: List of NetworkRack resource IDs under the Network Fabric. The number of racks allowed depends on the Network Fabric SKU.

l2IsolationDomains.description: List of L2 Isolation Domain resource IDs under the Network Fabric.

items.description: L2 Isolation Domain Azure resource ID.

l3IsolationDomains.description: List of L3 Isolation Domain resource IDs under the Network Fabric.

items.description: L3 Isolation Domain Azure resource ID.

provisioningState.description: Provides you the latest status of the NFC service, whether it is Accepted, updating, Succeeded or Failed. During this process, the states keep changing based on the status of NFC provisioning.

NetworkFabricProperties.description: Network Fabric Properties defines the properties of the resource.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

NetworkToNetworkInterconnect.description: The Network To Network Interconnect resource definition.

NetworkToNetworkInterconnectPatch.description: The Network To Network Interconnect resource patch definition.

NetworkToNetworkInterconnectProperties.description: Configuration used to setup CE-PE connectivity.

nniType.description: Type of NNI used. Example: CE | NPB

isManagementType.description: Configuration to use NNI for Infrastructure Management. Example: True/False.

useOptionB.description: Based on this option layer3 parameters are mandatory. Example: True/False

egressAclId.description: Egress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

ingressAclId.description: Ingress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

NetworkToNetworkInterconnectPatchablePro.description: Network to Network Interconnect patchable properties.

egressAclId.description: Egress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

ingressAclId.description: Ingress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

NetworkToNetworkInterconnectsList.description: List of Network To Network Interconnects.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

mtu.description: MTU to use for option A peering.

OptionBProperties.description: Option B configuration to be used for Management VPN.

importRouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for incoming routes into CE. This is for backward compatibility.

exportRouteTargets.description: Route Targets to be applied for outgoing routes from CE. This is for backward compatibility.

mtu.description: MTU of the packets between PE & CE.

interfaces.description: List of network device interfaces resource IDs.

items.description: Azure resource ID of the NetworkDevice/networkInterface.

peerASN.description: ASN of PE devices for CE/PE connectivity.Example : 28

fabricASN.description: ASN of CE devices for CE/PE connectivity.

validateAction.description: Validate action that to be performed

ManagementNetworkConfigurationPatchableP.description: Configuration to be used to setup the management network.

ManagementNetworkConfigurationProperties.description: Configuration to be used to setup the management network.

TerminalServerConfiguration.description: Network and credentials configuration currently applied to terminal server.

networkDeviceId.description: ARM Resource ID used for the NetworkDevice.

action.description: Action to be performed while upgrading the fabric.

NetworkToNetworkInterconnectNameParamete.description: Name of the Network to Network Interconnect.
NetworkToNetworkInterconnectNameParamete.name: networkToNetworkInterconnectName
